repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu-debootstrap:14.04 
MAINTAINER docker@vmaurik.nl 

RUN apt-get update && apt-get clean 
RUN apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y squid3 && apt-get clean && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
ADD squid.conf /etc/squid3/squid.conf 
ADD start.sh /start.sh 
RUN chmod +x /start.sh 
RUN mkdir /var/cache/squid 
RUN chown proxy:proxy /var/cache/squid 
RUN /usr/sbin/squid3 -N -z -F 

EXPOSE 3128 
CMD ["/start.sh"]
